name: Wafi Hassan
title: DevOps Team Leader and Developer
about: DevOps team leader and developer, experienced Automation Developer and System Validation Engineer. Skilled in Python, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), Java, PHP, Linux, C++, C, and Ruby. Strong quality assurance professional with a Practical Software Engineer background.

experience.description: Responsible for designing and implementing automated systems to enhance production efficiency and product quality.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment processes to ensure seamless software delivery.
Created automated test scripts and frameworks to improve software testing efficiency and coverage.
Provided technical support and maintenance for computer systems and networks within the organization.

education.description: Studied various software engineering disciplines with a focus on practical applications and real-world problem solving.
